verify_email.subject: Verify your email address
verify_email.body: Hello, and welcome to Storytime! Before we get started, we need you to verify your email address. Once you confirm your email address, you'll be able to access extra features surrounding the security of your account.

forgot_password.subject: Reset your password
forgot_password.body: We received a request to reset the password for your account, which you can do by clicking the button below. If you didn't request a password reset, feel free to delete this email and keep using Storytime!
